title: Wireless Caregiver Pager Smart Call System 1 SOS Call Button, PENCK Waterproof Door Entry Bell Chime, 500-Ft Range, 52 Melodies, 4 Volume Levels, 2 Plug-in Receivers, LED Flash
features: Reliable Doorbell Kit: Our product is made of the Non-toxic ABS material. IP55 Waterproof Push Button Remote keeps itself against from dust,rain and high temperature. Ultra-low power consumption, No electromagnetic radiation.

Energy Saving & Long Usage: Ultra-low-power design, energy saving and sustainable use. If press 5 times per day, the transmitter battery can be used for around 12 months. Pure point control operation make the transmitter can withstand more than 100 thousand times click.

Long Distance Control & Diversified Chimes Selection: The wireless doorbell operating range over 400ft/125m (Maxium 1000ft/300m in open area) ensures that you will never miss any visitors or package delivery, 52 ringtones available, 4 levels of adjustable volume from 25db - 112db, LED indicators.

High-frequency Technology: Using adaptive high-frequency technology, more anti-interference than the ordinary doorbell over 800ft/250m in the open area, strong penetration and signal stability, can penetrate a few walls.

Easy Installation: NO more complex installation instructions- NO special tools needed to install our wireless plug-in doorbell! Just plug the receiver into your home outlet, insert the INCLUDED Battery (12V 23A) and mount the push-button base on the door frame with DOUBLE-SIDED ADHESIVE TAPE or the SCREWS INCLUDED in our kit!
description: 52 different musical tones for optional and adjustable indoor ring volume.
